document.full_text: data storage systems provider dot hill systems corp  said it developed a new post-production storage software for editing applications, including apple inc's  final cut pro and autodesk's  smoke, sending its shares up 20 percent on wednesday. shares of the company rose 55 cents to a day high of $3.27 in morning trade.
document.title: dot hill develops storage software for apple's video editing
lines_and_colors: data storage systems provider dot hill systems corp  said it developed a new post-production storage software for editing applications, including apple inc's  final cut pro and autodesk's  smoke, sending its shares up 20 percent on wednesday. shares of the company rose 55 cents to a day high of $3.27 in morning trade.
